attributes.action: Make the long term unemployed earn their money by volunteering and serving the community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems to me and others alike that it is far too easy to remain unemployed and collect payments to finance this.  Would it be fair to expect a return for the payments such as volunteering or community work.  The chance to give something back!  I find it simply unfair that we as a family pay more and more while those that do not work get more and more.  I'm fairly confident that my voice is not alone.
